title: HoP 181 - By the Book - Ibn Taymiyya
itunes:title: HoP 181 - By the Book - Ibn Taymiyya
description: The controversial jurist Ibn Taymiyya sets forth an originalist theory of law and a searching criticism of the philosophers’ logic.
